actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the continued operation of the Public Health Service hospitals.

summary.text: Provides for the continued operation of Public Health Service hospitals in Seattle, Washington; Boston, Massachusetts; San Francisco, California; Galveston, Texas; New Orleans, Louisiana; Baltimore, Maryland; Staten Islands, New York; and Norfolk, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the continued operation of the Public Health Service hospitals.
